main.title: Fabien Cellard
main.subtitle: I'm a junior developer. I love making games and writing stories.

about.description: Hi! I'm a french developer from **Lyon**. I'm currently doing a masters degree in Computer Science at **UQAC** (Chicoutmi QC, Canada) specialized in video games in collaboration with my engineer's degree at **Polytech Lyon**.

projects.title: Ånd
projects.subtitle: A first-person puzzle game made with a team of 8 using the Unreal Engine.

projects.title: Vue portfolio template
projects.subtitle: A portfolio template made with VueJS

projects.title: Winter WonderJam 2020 : Grannyies War
projects.subtitle: A game made for the Winter edition of Wonderjam 2020 in 48 hours in a team of 6.

projects.title: Fall WonderJam 2019 : Space League
projects.subtitle: A game made for the Winter edition of Wonderjam 2020 in 48 hours in a team of 6.

projects.title: Timesick
projects.subtitle: Game made in a team of 4 for the 8INF960 class at UQAC

projects.title: Unreal Network Game
projects.subtitle: Game made with Unreal to tinker with its networking features.

projects.title: Promovols
projects.subtitle: Travel selling site I worked during an internship at Travelys / Speedmedia.

education.degree: Computer Science Master - Video Games specialization

works.title: Intern Gameplay Programmer
works.description: Worked on mobile racing games. Had to design a camera system to spectate a race live or from a replay. I also made an objective system to support things such as missions and achievements with some server side code.

works.title: Intern Fullstack Developper
works.description: During my internship I worked on the maintenance of Travelys' website. I also worked on different internal projects and Promovol's first website.
